definition: patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: Wuzhen Water Village style integrity, and maintain a complete pattern of Yangtze River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 乌镇水乡风貌完整，保持了完整的江南水乡格局。

sentences.english: Changzhou is a water country of the Jiangnan, canals criss-crossing, bridges legion.
sentences.chinese: 常州为江南水乡，河渠纵横，桥梁众多。

sentences.english: To Chen, these villages by the water were filled with the memories of his youth.
sentences.chinese: 对陈逸飞而言，江南水乡更盛载他的少年回忆。

sentences.english: He restarted the creation of oil paintings, including the works depicting the scenery of water villages in Jiangnan.
sentences.chinese: 重新开始油画创作，有江南水乡风光等。

sentences.english: At the same time, the style and features of canal towns in south China also offer a unique narrative space to the vernacular novels.
sentences.chinese: 同时，江南水乡又为话本小说提供了别致的叙事空间。

definition: patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu/same as 江南水鄉|江南水乡[Jiang1 nan2 shui3 xiang1]

south of Changjiang or Yangtze river/south of the lower reaches of Changjiang/often refers to south Jiangsu, south Anhui and north Zhejiang provinces/a province during Qing times/in literature, refers to the sunny south/Gangnam (district in Seoul, South Korea)
Zhouzhuang, old canal town between Shanghai and Suzhou, tourist attraction
(lit.) land of fish and rice/(fig.) fertile region/land of milk and honey
interesting and appealing (of old locations, objects etc)
lit. there is heaven above, and there is 蘇杭|苏杭[Su1 Hang2] below (idiom)/fig. the beauty and affluence of Suzhou and Hangzhou is comparable with heaven
pinyin: shang4 you3 tian1 tang2 , xia4 you3 Su1 Hang2

definition: water from a mountain/mountains and rivers/scenery/landscape
mountains on one side and water on the other
